title: Immobiliser System Description

body.body: This model is fitted with an electronic immobiliser system to help protect against theft. This system has to be paired with the engine ECM and the ignition key which contains a transponder chip. If all the components are correctly paired, the immobiliser will allow the engine to start. The Triumph diagnostic tool is the only way these components can be paired.

In addition, the system has an on-board diagnostic function. This ensures that, should a malfunction occur in the immobiliser system, a malfunction code is stored in the immobiliser/tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS) control module memory. This stored data can then be recovered using the Triumph diagnostic tool (see
